videoData.title: An easy way to cook up innovation
videoData.socialTitle: An easy way to cook up innovation

nodes.whoTheyAre: Joachim Horn transformed the complicated process of creating smart devices and products by empowering everyone to become an instant innovator. A mechanical engineering graduate and co-founder of the Imperial College Design Collective, Horn fused his passion for design and tech to develop SAM Labs. SAM, dubbed the “Lego of the Internet generation,” is the world’s most engaging Internet of Things toolset, giving users tools to become inventors.

videoData.description: Joachim Horn wants engineering to feel more like cooking -- so he developed simple "ingredients" that can be easily mixed to make smart technology. By reinfusing technological engineering with joy and ease, anyone can be an inventor. SAM Labs powers K-12 educators with no frills, pedagogically sound solutions created by educators and researchers. SAM Labs brings fun and results to STEM, STEAM and coding learning.
videoData.socialDescription: Joachim Horn wants engineering to feel more like cooking -- so he developed simple "ingredients" that can be easily mixed to make smart technology.
